## Cargar los datos

```{r}
load("Datos/accidentes2020_data.rda")
library(tidyverse)
accidentes <- 
  accidentes2020_data |> 
  as.tibble()

accidentes
  
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}
resumen <- accidentes |> filter(sexo != "Desconocido") |>  count(sexo)
resumen
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}
#| code-fold: true
ggplot(resumen)+
  geom_col(aes (x=sexo, y=n ,fill=sexo), alpha=0.6)+
  theme_minimal()
```
